vulnerabilities.short_description: Security Misconfiguration with the config `SECRET_KEY` set to a static value `None`
vulnerabilities.description: Security Misconfiguration with the config `SECRET_KEY` set to a static value `None`
vulnerabilities.recommendation:
Django application is not configured correctly for deployment to production and live environments. Default settings that are more appropriate for development environment are in use.
